mapper.insert: insert into sys_export_t (sz_id, sz_directory, sz_comment, sz_operator, ts_created, ts_updated, nt_row_state, nt_row_version) values (#{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szDirectory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tsUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ntRowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ntRowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select sz_id, sz_directory, sz_comment, sz_operator, ts_created, ts_updated, nt_row_state, nt_row_version from sys_export_t where sz_id = #{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
